ygData.subject: Lute of the Gypsy Princess un-nerfed? DOUBLE the effect?!
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, a guildmate of mine stated today that he is now able to heal 45 points per tick with his Lute of the Gypsy Princess found in Mistmoore. He is a lvl 45
ygData.messageBody:
Well, a guildmate of mine stated today that he is now able to heal 45 points
per tick with his Lute of the Gypsy Princess found in Mistmoore. He is a lvl
45 bard. Can anyone verify this info? I was not near him to test it out, and
he blows alot of hot air at times. So I just wanted to see if anyone else
is experiencing this insane (that's not a complaint) rise in our bretheren's
ability to heal with song.

This info blew my mind (not to mention irritated the hell out of my cleric
gf, heheheh). I had never bothered to get this item because I knew that it
was nerfed and worked only as well as a regular stringed instrument. I also
hate Castle Mistmoore. =) Whatever Verant was planning on doing with this
item as far as magical properties, I NEVER expected this! Does this also
mean our lvl 2 and lvl 48 DoT songs are that much more powerful? <evil grin>

Anyone, someone please test and post as I do not have the item available to
do so myself. =(

Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Kelethin of the 48th Chorus
Veeshan
